title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce solution built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Stripe integration. Features include user authentication, product management, and order processing.

title: Task Management App
description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Interactive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, historical data visualization, and responsive design for all devices.

title: AI Chat Application
description: Modern chat application powered by AI with real-time messaging, smart responses, and customizable chat themes.
